Palace saddened by incidents of violence against women, children during community quarantine tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741816 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741816/palace-saddened-by-incidents-of-violence-against-women-children-during-community-quarantine/story/ Malacañang on Tuesday said it was saddened by the incidents of violence against women and children during the implementation of community quarantine in the country to stop the spread of COVID-19. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 15:00:12 +0800
Sotto: Transmitted anti-terror bill still for Duterte s review before signing tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741815 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741815/sotto-transmitted-anti-terror-bill-still-for-duterte-s-review-before-signing/story/ Senate President Vicente Sotto III said the final copies of the proposed Anti-Terrorism Act have officially been received by the office of the Executive Secretary and the Presidential Legislative Liaison Office. Asked if he thinks Duterte will enact it on the same day, the Senate President said: "Hindi. Matagal pa 'yun." Tue, 09 Jun 2020 14:50:26 +0800
Proposal to seize China assets in Philippines for WPS damage needs further study --Hontiveros tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741805 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741805/proposal-to-seize-china-assets-in-philippines-for-wps-damage-needs-further-study-hontiveros/story/ Senator Risa Hontiveros on Tuesday said the suggestion to seize China's assets in the Philippines as payback for the damage it has caused in the disputed territorial waters needs further study to determine if such is allowed by the Constitution. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 14:47:50 +0800

Tue, 09 Jun 2020 14:34:34 +0800
Hontiveros insists on Bayanihan law audit, says it can be done in special session tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741807 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741807/hontiveros-insists-on-bayanihan-law-audit-says-it-can-be-done-in-special-session/story/ The audit of the implementation of the now expired Bayanihan to Heal as One Act may be conducted if a special session will be called by President Rodrigo Duterte even when Congress is adjourned sine die, according to Senator Risa Hontiveros on Tuesday. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 14:09:08 +0800
Duterte to meet with IATF in Davao City on Thursday tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741806 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741806/duterte-to-meet-with-iatf-in-davao-city-on-thursday/story/ “I can confirm that the next meeting with the President on Thursday will be in Davao,” presidential spokesperson Harry Roque said in a televised briefing. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 14:04:49 +0800
DOJ reports possible COVID-19 cases after 3 personnel test positive in rapid test tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741801 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741801/doj-reports-possible-covid-19-cases-after-3-personnel-test-positive-in-rapid-test/story/ Three personnel of the Department of Justice (DOJ) have tested positive for COVID-19 based on rapid testing, making them "possible cases" pending the results of a confirmatory test, Justice Secretary Menardo Guevarra said Tuesday. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 13:46:54 +0800
Gamboa appeals to public not to hold protest actions: There are other ways to express opinion tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741800 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741800/gamboa-appeals-to-public-not-to-hold-protest-actions-there-are-other-ways-to-express-opinion/story/ "Ngayon kasi, in a situation na mayroon tayong pandemic, there is an added demand from the public which is actually the requirement of less mass gathering and social distancing," PNP chief Police General Archie Francisco Gamboa said at the Laging Handa press briefing. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 13:45:46 +0800
Vergeire: Role of new DOH Usec Vega yet to be determined tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741799 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741799/vergeire-role-of-new-doh-usec-vega-yet-to-be-determined/story/ “Hindi pa namin talaga alam, hindi pa rin talaga clear, kasi hindi pa kami nakakausap regarding this matter,” Health Undersecretary Maria Rosario Vergeire said at a virtual briefing. “Wala pa rin iyong order…kasi usually pag may inilalagay na personnel sa department, may inilalabas na department order, at wala pang lumalabas na ganito,” she added. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 13:31:56 +0800
Distribution of second tranche of cash aid seen to start this week tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741798 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741798/distribution-of-second-tranche-of-cash-aid-seen-to-start-this-week/story/ Distribution of the second tranche of the government cash aid to qualified beneficiaries may start this week even as the distribution of the first one was not yet completely finished, the Department of Social Welfare and Development (DSWD) said Tuesday. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 13:25:58 +0800
House bill seeks online selling platforms to register with DTI, obtain 'trust mark' -solon tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741797 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741797/house-bill-seeks-online-selling-platforms-to-register-with-dti-obtain-trust-mark-solon/story/ The House bill aiming to regulate the e-commerce industry in the Philippines will seek online selling platforms to register with the Department of Trade and Industry (DTI) and obtain a "trust mark" so that buyers will have confidence in transacting with them. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 13:25:49 +0800
DOH checking date of 'onset of illness' among COVID-19 patients to determine 'fresh' cases tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741794 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741794/doh-checking-date-of-onset-of-illness-among-covid-19-patients-to-determine-fresh-cases/story/ The Department of Health is tracing the date of onset of illness in patients positive for the novel coronavirus in light of the increasing number of fresh COVID-19 cases reported this week, Health Undersecretary Maria Rosario Vergeire said Monday. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 13:24:15 +0800
NWRB: Water supply to MWSS normal even as customers complain of low pressure tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741795 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741795/nwrb-water-supply-to-mwss-normal-even-as-customers-complain-of-low-pressure/story/ "Sa ngayon, 188.6 meters ang level ng Angat Dam, so medyo umayos naman po ang level niya at malapit lapit na 'yung tag-ulan kaya sa ngayon normal ang supply ng tubig na binibigay natin sa MWSS," NWRB executive director Sevillo David Jr. said in an interview on "Dobol B sa News TV." Tue, 09 Jun 2020 13:02:40 +0800
LTFRB eyes opening 31 rationalized city bus routes by June 19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741792 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/741792/ltfrb-eyes-opening-31-rationalized-city-bus-routes-by-june-19/story/ The LTFRB reminded the operators and drivers of public utility buses to follow minimum health standards such as wearing face masks and gloves and cleaning and disinfecting the unit before and after every travel or every two hours. They must also place a barrier made of non-permeable and transparent materials, and comply with the regulation on passenger seating capacity. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 12:37:37 +0800
11 dengue cases monitored in Kidapawan City tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741783 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/741783/11-dengue-cases-monitored-in-kidapawan-city/story/ At least 11 dengue cases were monitored in a village in Kidapawan City during the onset of heavy rains last week, Mayor Joseph Evangelista said. Tue, 09 Jun 2020 12:37:16 +0800
